import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # plotting

We imported the our FIFA 19 data with "pd.read_csv" and equalized that "data" variable. You should find the path that is your data and use that for importing data. If your files type is different from csv(for example xlsx) then you have to change "pd.read_csv" with "pd.read_xlsx".
  
  In this chapter we learn also "info" command. You can show some basic features about your data as you can see in the code.
